name: 8 Trigrams 128 Palms
effect:
Requirements: "Neji Hyuga" or "Byakugan" + "An Entrance cost of 4 or more"
Target: Every Ninja Battling against the user
Effect: Flip a Ninja Blade coin 4 times. Give 1 Damage to any of the target for each heads.
"He changed his form…!"

name: A Piece Of Star
effect:
Permanent
Effect: At the beginning of your turn, place 1 Ninja Blade coin (symbolizing a Meteorite coin) on 1 of your in-play "Star" Ninjas. Ninjas with a Meteorite coin get +1/+1 for each Meteorite coin on it. At the end of the turn, discard every Ninja that has 3 or more Meteorite coins.
"This village has the star that all five Kages have been envious of."

name: Abandonment
effect: Effect: Search for 1 "Zabuza Momochi" or "Haku" Ninja card in your Deck, show it to your opponent, and place it in your hand. Then, shuffle your Deck.
"My time here is done, Haku… Tonight I cast aside the Land of Water…"

name: Affected Body
effect:
Permanent
Effect: Players must discard the top card of their Deck each time they send a Team out to Battle.
"By using it…you're taking a risk, aren't you"

name: Agari Kaisen
effect:
Kedoin Clan | Male | Mental Power: 2
[SECRET JUTSU OF THE CLAN]
Valid: During your Mission Phase, you can designate an in play Ninja name. In that case, this Ninja's name is treated as the same as the designated Ninja's during the turn.
"Our clan, Kedoin, is known for its secret jutsu 'Face Copying Jutsu!!"

name: Akahoshi
effect:
Star | Satoosa | Male | Mental Power: 2
[AMBITION OF THE STAR]
When this Ninja is put in play, you can move 1 Meteorite coin on your other in-play Ninjas to this Ninja.
Valid: This Ninja cannot be discarded due to the effect of "A Piece of Star" Mission card.

name: Akamaru
effect:
Leaf | Ninja Dog | Animal | Growth

While you have a "Kiba Inuzuka" in play, the original healthy status Power values of this Ninja and your "Kiba Inuzuka" become 2/2
Valid: While your "Kiba Inuzuka" is in the same Team as this Ninja, they cannot be affected by the effects of your opponent's Ninjas.

name: Ambitious Squad
effect: Effect: Put 1 Ninja card in your Chakra area with "The Four Sound Ninja" + "Ambush" + "An Entrance cost of 3" into play.
"This is the first step for lord Orochimaru's ambition…"

name: Ambush
effect:
Permanent (2)

name: Anko Mitarashi
effect:
Leaf | Special Jonin | Female | Proctor | Mental Power: 1

name: Asuma Sarutobi
effect: Leaf | Jonin | Male

name: Back to the Leaf Village
effect:
Permanent (2)

"Now, I'm back!! It hasn't changed a bit!!"

name: Being a Fool
effect:
Permanent (3)

name: Binding Destiny
effect: Effect: Each player shuffles all the cards in their Discard Pile into their Deck.

name: Browbeater
effect:
Target: Every Ninja with a Turn cost of 3 or less

Target: X number of your opponent's Ninjas

effect:
Circus | Animal

Permanent (2)

Leaf | Genin | Male | Growth
